General.Name: Malayan Flour Mills Bhd
General.Description: Malayan Flour Mills Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the flour and poultry businesses in Malaysia and Vietnam. The company's Flour and Grain Trading segment is involved in milling and selling wheat flour; and trading in grains and other allied products. Its Poultry Integration segment manufactures and sells animal feed, as well as related raw materials; processes and sells poultry products; and breeds and sells day-old-chicks, as well as engages in the poultry grow-out farm and contract farming activities. The company also engages in the manufacture and sale of aqua feeds; and trading of corn, soybean meal, and other feed ingredients. Malayan Flour Mills Berhad was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
